page.description: Retrieve field names in a cr-lf separated list.
page.original:
&ltTBL>.FIELD_NAME_GET() Syntax Field_Name_List as C = &ltTBL>.FIELD_NAME_GET() Description The &ltTBL>.FIELD_NAME_GET() method returns the names of the fields in a table. Example dim tbl as P tbl = table.open("customer") ? tbl.field_name_get() = Customer_id Firstname Lastname Company Phone Fax Bill_address_1 Bill_address_2 Bill_city Bill_state_region Bill_postal_code Bill_country Ship_address_1 Ship_address_2 Ship_city Ship_state_region Ship_postal_code Ship_country Ship_same Email Rtfmemo
See Also Table Functions and Methods
